game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: In search of a legendary artifact, you must explore the treacherous ruins and overcome its challenges to uncover its secrets.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

task.description: Make your way through the dense forest and find the entrance to the ruins.
A protective statue guards the artifact. You must defeat it to proceed.
Align the ancient mirrors in the chamber to unlock the artifact's resting place.
